humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there is no evidence of malignancy in the sentinel lymph nodes (Rule 2, Rule 8, New Rule 10, New Rule 11). The report explicitly states 'There is no evidence of malignancy in either of 2 lymph nodes' (A.). Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'A. Sentinel lymph nodes, right axilla, biopsy: There is no evidence of malignancy in either of 2 lymph nodes.' This indicates that the sentinel lymph nodes did not contain any malignancy, which corresponds to an N0 stage. The Nottingham grade, tumor size, and other factors do not affect the N stage in this case.
